body_html:
@csarofeen I don't understand why, but this has some problem when the process raises error. I tried this patch on the new test_manager_unclean_exit from #9655 and it fails the case that main process raises an error.

Additionally, I don't think we should arbitrarily add a lock mechanism to the mp.Queue (it should only be augmented with the pickling mechanism on tensors).

Given these, how do you think about we use #9655 for 0.4.1? That one passes the test and seems fine.
